Subject: Issue with license activation
Description: Hello, we received instructions from your team on how to activate the license key for our Pingcastle tool. Unfortunately, after downloading the pingcastle package, I did not see the PingCastle.exe.config file where, according to your instructions, I should put the key. Can you please guide me how to do it?
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
1- Download PC package
2- Don't see the PingCastle.exe.config file
What_We_Know__c: Customer Downloaded the PC package but is not able to see the PingCastle.exe.config file
Next_Steps__c: Wait for customer to send screenshot
Solution_Comment__c:
Download the version from the portal.
Sent information and explained how to run the healthchecks
